standard.join:
Polite.ai bot here, thanks for inviting me ${userId}
Please can you tell me a bit more about this room, for example are the discussions technical, social, work related or political?
standard.rejoin:
Polite.ai bot here, thanks for inviting me ${userId}, I have a feeling of deja-vu as I have been here before!
In order to interact with me, for eaxmple to flag toxicity I don't notice or tell me I have got things wrong, please tag me like this:
${botName}: I disagree with you
standard.aggression: That comment seems to me a little aggressive ${userId}
standard.toxicity: That comment troubles me ${userId} - it seems like it may be a little toxic or negative
standard.attack: Please try to avoid using langauge that could be perceived as a personal attack ${userId}
standard.inviteAppeal: (do tell me if I'm wrong by tagging me in a reply)
